subjectline.content: Donâ€™t put all your resin in one basket.

html.content:
To view this email as a web page, click here.
Hi [FirstName],

Buying all your resin from suppliers in one area can lead to supply chain disruptions down the road. Our advice? Don't put all your resin in one basket.

In order to provide the majority of plastics converters near the northeast with a reliable PE supply, Shell Polymers' polyethylene plant is conveniently located in Monaca, PA. Located on the Ohio River, our new plant is within 700 miles of most North American PE buyers. That's why converters who work with Shell Polymers gain access to competitive advantages like:
■ A reliable PE supply in your own backyard
 
■ Industrial-sized equipment for troubleshooting and experimentation
 
■ Access to 50+ technical polymer experts across every conversion process
Learn more about how our plant is designed to provide a confident PE supply. Then, follow us on LinkedIn for construction updates as they happen.

Best,

Shell Polymers
Stay In-the-Know
Get the latest news on the PE industry as well as expert tips on removing supply chain obstacles.
Follow Us on LinkedIn

To view this email as a web page, click here.
Hi [FirstName],

Any downtime can cost your company time and money. That's why Shell Polymers wants to arm you with insider tips and tricks like the best use for polymer processing aids in blown film production. Our team put together this white paper with two real-world scenarios in mind.

The first looks at what change improves profitability more: the use of PPAs or a switch from mono- to multilayer production lines. The second scenario looks at how PPAs can reduce die lip buildup to increase uptime.

We hope you find this valuable! Be sure to follow us on LinkedIn for more insights and up-to-date information.

Best,

Shell Polymers

html.content:
To view this email as a web page, click here.
Hi [FirstName],

We know how vital supply chain reliability is to your business. It's why we're implementing simulation technology to get operators comfortable with managing units before our plant even opens.

This kind of training is just one way that Shell Polymers helps ensure the quality of our product (and reduce headaches for you!). Benefit from higher quality output because our people trained on custom simulations before our equipment went live, giving them a deeper knowledge of how to efficiently manage it.

Check out the full article for more information and reach out to discuss how Shell Polymers can help you create a more reliable supply chain.

Best,

Shell Polymers
